name: AstroCat MegaJam2019
description:
Team French Stray Cats :

Marine Saint Aroman : marine.saint.aroman@gmail.com

Alix Faure : a.faure34@orange.fr

Kevin Combret : kev.combret@gmail.com

Antoine Le Guen : antoine.le-guen@orange.fr

Benjamin Gerotto : benjamingerotto@gmail.com

Game Name : AstroCat

Controls :

WSAD to move while falling

Escape to quit at anytime

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hello,

In AstroCat your goal is to catch as many fish as possible during your run down to earth. Try to reach the ground as fast as possible and be careful, you need to  avoid meteors, satellites, planes or balloons  !

Enjoy.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Sounds got on freesfx.co.uk

Skybox texture box got on Spacescape software and modified.

All 3D assets , code and other textures created by the team.
